mapper.select: select * from poll order by poll_seq

select mb.dong as dong, mb.ho as ho, mb.name as name, ps.poll_select_seq as poll_select_seq from poll pl left join poll_options po on pl.poll_seq = po.poll_seq left join poll_select ps on po.option_seq = ps.option_seq left join member mb on ps.member_seq = mb.member_seq where pl.poll_seq = #{seq}
